My projects

Here is a small collection of personal and professional projects I've completed over the years.

Electric Calculator

Plug and play solution to calculate whether an electric vehicle is suitable for the client's needs based on user input

Tech used:

Vue, Webpack, Bootstrap 4, Vue Formulate, Vue Form Wizard

blobs.js

Plugin that generates particles with built-in controls to play with

Tech used:

Vanilla JS, HTML, CSS

Give me colors

Plugin that outputs a wide selection of colours based on the selected shade

Tech used:

Vanilla JS, HTML, CSS

Auto100

Professional project for Auto100, luxury car dealership

Tech used:

HTML, CSS, Javascript, GSAP

Hartwell Group

Professional project for Hartwell Group, first one to integrate Vue JS with Bluesky's platform

Tech used:

Vue, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

Animation Reveal JS

Javascript exercise to simulate what wow.js does, add classes to elements on scroll, very basic approach without mutation observer.

Tech used:

Vanilla JS, HTML, CSS

Dreamplay Landing

Landing page for a startup project in the videogame industry

Tech used:

HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Vanilla JS

Dreamplay UX

Adobe XD Concept for a social gaming platform

Tech used:

Adobe XD

Imaginix Landing

Landing page for a videogame that was in development in 2013

Tech used:

HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Vanilla JS
